mapper.sql: id, username, nickname, password, role, email, mobile
mapper.insert: insert into user ( username, nickname, password, role, email, mobile ) values ( #{username}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{role}, #{email}, #{mobile} )
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile} where id = #{id}
